img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8d/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2822%29.png)
He'll either launch himself at you and then spin the unicycle around until he flips it up and lands down heavily where you are, or he'll start to spin around the entirety of the arena and multiple duplicates of the unicycle will appear. These will then launch into a crisscross attack to get you, and he'll follow up with a heavy attack.
img_below_text:
When his health is down to the last third, he will cover the arena with a red haze, reducing the size of the arena that you'll fight the creature in. He will also begin to use two swords instead of one. This is when you want to throw out the Plantain Fan. It will clear the red haze immediately and continuously stun him, giving you more time to whittle down his health.
Supreme Celestial Inspector

These will then launch into a crisscross attack to get you, and he'll follow up with a heavy attack."
        - Following Text: "When his health is down to the last third, he will cover the arena with a red haze, reducing the size of the arena that you'll fight the creature in. He will also begin to use two swords instead of one. This is when you want to throw out the Plantain Fan. It will clear the red haze immediately and continuously stun him, giving you more time to whittle down his health.
Supreme Celestial Inspector"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic boss battle scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, wielding a staff and wearing ornate armor, faces off against a winged enemy with glowing red weapons and a fiery unicycle-like attack. The arena is engulfed in a red haze, which matches the preceding and following text describing the enemy's advanced attack patterns and the shrinking arena. This visual likely corresponds to the phase where the boss uses two swords and the red haze mechanic, emphasizing the importance of using the Plantain Fan to counter the effects and gain an advantage.
